message: I was reading @ericflo's article http://www.eflorenzano.com/blog/post/spawning-django/ and am thinking of doing a long-polling, realtime app similar to friendfeed. My question is: is Spawning good enough to do this? Should I use nginx on the front? Or should I use straight up Eventlet?
The app is written in Django, by the way...
Also that post is like 3 years old, prety sure even @ericflo would agree on Eventlet now (or at least Gevent)
I think @ericflo would especially go with Eventlet now, given that is what runs Convore...
What about Twisted, CherryPy, Tornado? Any of these easier/harder to implement?
